name: Food and Drink Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 15 Questions

questions.text: The Greek dish moussaka contains layers of minced lamb, what is the other main ingredient?
What is the main ingredient in Borshch (chilled soup)?
This is an edible decoration i.e. parsley, watercress or lemon added to a dish to enhance its appearance
This is a Jamaican rum liqueur, based on coffee extracts and local spices.
This cocktail contains 2 parts vodka, 6 parts orange juice, crushed ice and 1 part galliano.
This pudding consists of a meringue base topped with fresh cream and soft fruits such as raspberries or redcurrants.
Which fatty-acid known to be beneficial for a healthy heart, is present in fish especially mackerel and tuna?
If all these ingredients are blended together what dish would I create - stale white bread, smoked cod or carp roe, olive oil, lemon and a slice of onion?
questions.explanation:
taramasalata.

	Taramasalata is a greek dish served as a tempting starter.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a type of tea?
Another name for bean curd, used in vegetarian cooking and made from the soya bean.
Although officially a vegetable(as only the pink stems of this plant are eaten) it is almost exclusively used in sweet dishes such as pies and crumbles.
These are small pieces of fried or toasted bread served with soups or salads.

questions.correct: type of butter used in Indian cookery
options: fine flour made from wheat or potatoes
savoury jelly used for setting dishes
questions.explanation: type of butter used in Indian cookery.

questions.text: Who of the following is a famous British cook and has sold many top selling books?
